Synopsis: Voice barks for Astarion as the player interacts with the screen. 'Normal' lines are lines spoken while walking about in the world, but not in combat or sneaking. 'Sneaking' lines are spoken while in stealth mode - crouched and hiding - and should be read in a hushed voice. 'Combat' lines are spoken while in combat, and should sound stressed/urgent unless otherwise indicated.
